mapper.select: select a.question_id questionId,a.user_id userId,a.is_right "right",a.question_type_id questionTypeId,c.point_id pointId,c.point_name pointName,d.field_id fieldId,d.field_name fieldName from et_user_question_history a,et_question_2_point b,et_knowledge_point c,et_field d where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.question_id=b.question_id and b.point_id=c.point_id and c.field_id=d.field_id and d.field_id=#{fieldId}

select c.field_id fieldId,c.point_id pointId,c.point_name pointName,sum(1) amount,sum(case when a.is_right=1 then 1 else 0 end) rightAmount, sum(case when a.is_right=0 then 1 else 0 end) wrongAmount from et_user_question_history a,et_question_2_point b,et_knowledge_point c where a.question_id=b.question_id and b.point_id=c.point_id and c.field_id=#{fieldId} and a.user_id=#{userId} group by c.field_id,c.point_id,c.point_name

select c.field_id fieldId,c.point_id pointId,c.point_name pointName,a.question_type_id questionTypeId,sum(1) amount,sum(case when a.is_right=1 then 1 else 0 end) rightAmount, sum(case when a.is_right=0 then 1 else 0 end) wrongAmount from et_user_question_history a,et_question_2_point b,et_knowledge_point c where a.question_id=b.question_id and b.point_id=c.point_id and c.field_id=#{fieldId} and a.user_id=#{userId} group by c.field_id,c.point_id,c.point_name,a.question_type_id
